701937f-a.text:
University Avenue, west side, south from R. 174th Street, showing the heavily wooded grounds of the Academy of the Sacred Heart, the former William B. Ogden estate. the Ogden estate extended west toward Sedgwick Avenue.
E. P. Chrystie  Nay 30, 1923

701937f-b.text:
University Avenue, west side, south from R. 174th Street, showing the heavily wooded grounds of the Academy of the Sacred Heart, the former William B. Ogden estate. the Ogden estate extended west toward Sedgwick Avenue.
E. P. Chrystie  Nay 30, 1923

701939f-a.text:
1615 to 1601 University Ave., west side, south from West 175th to West 174th Streets. On the extreme left, at the S.W. corner of West 174th Street, is visible one of the buildings of the Academy of the
Sacred Heart.
About 1924.
